mean_cn: adj. 冷冻的；  v. 使…冻住
mean_en: (of food) kept at a very low temperature in order to preserve it; (of people or parts of the body) extremely cold; (of rivers, lakes, etc.) with a layer of ice on the surface; (especially of ground) so cold that it has become very hard; unable to move because of a strong emotion such as fear or horror
sentence: The forest stream became frozen during winter.
sentence_trans: 森林里的小溪在冬天结冰了。
